chapters.title: Chapter 5:  The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info:
Lamgwin Dorn,
      p. 185 (212)â€”Breane's boyfriend, a hard, bulky man from
      Caemlyn.  He lived as a street thug, but was loyal to his queen.
      He joined Morgase when she left the country,
      and has since become Perrin's bodyservant.
